page.title: 15Buildings
page.content: Most of the buildings in our are made of stone.This is because most of them were built in the late ninetenth and early twentieth century. Such is our house.We have all modern conveniences,as we have modernised our house recently.Nowadays with the aid of Council Grants i.e money from the council,it is far easier to renovate old houses. There are also many brick buildings,some of which were built recently and some dating from early this century. Since the war (1939-1945) many pre-fabricated or engineered buildings have been built here.Nowadays we suspect this is how the houses of the future will be built.
